title: feat: add tier cost simulation dashboard

gist.headline: Crystal ball for credits
gist.blurb: New simulation tools help us predict how tier changes affect the ecosystem. Modeling the future before we build it.

gist.impact: Enables data-driven decisions on tier limits to ensure sustainability without guessing.
